name: the Blacksmith...
description:
It's been a long time, I've moved away from the village to demonstrate my crafting talents , and now about five years I'm working in the mainland of the kingdom as a

blacksmith in the artillery where was bacially making . swords for the " royal army " of the kingdom, as today is way less than half a year

ago because of the unexpected assaults on the kingdom by unrecognized creatures. .so we named them " demons"............

to find the path he follows play -"THE BLACKSMITH"
